question:
Who among the following decided to resign from the Congress working committee after noticing the leftist tendency of Jawaharlal Nehru?
1. B.V. Patel
2. Rajendra Prasad
3. C. Rajagopalachari
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: B.V. Patel, C. Rajagopalachari and Rajendra Prasad decided to resign from the Congress working committee after noticing the leftist tendency of Jawaharlal Nehru. Soon after Gandhiji intervened and dismissed their resignation.
